title: The Varied Reality of Sugar Babies and Sugar Daddies
itunes:title: The Varied Reality of Sugar Babies and Sugar Daddies
itunes:subtitle: When services rendered takes on a whole different meaning
description:
Did you know there are 6 types of sugar baby and sugar daddy arrangements per a study done back in 2019? This week, Madi and Aleena walk us through the complex reality of the sugaring world from the average sugar baby allowance on seeking arrangements, to the different types of arrangements that exist (hint: not all sugaring relationships involve sex!), and whether or not they'd actually do it.



Don't forget to follow us and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
